maqras.text: Watashi wa, fukkatsu no hi ni oite chikau
Mata, jiseki suru tamashī ni oite chikau
Ningen wa, ware ga kare no hone o atsume rarenai to kangaeru no ka
Iya, ware wa kare no yubisaki (no hone) made soroeru koto ga dekiru nodearu
Daga ningen wa, kare no gozen (no seikatsu) ni oite mo, tsumiwookasu koto o nozomu
Kare wa,`fukkatsu no hi wa itsuka.' To tou
Tsuini megakuramu-ji
tsuki wa 蝕 Keri
taiyō to tsuki wa awase rareru
Sonohi ningen wa,`doko ni hinan shiyou ka.' To iu
Danjite yoke rarenai nodearu
Anata no omo no omoto ga, sonohi sadame no sumaidearu
Sonohi (subete no) ningen wa, sudeni itta koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto ni tsuite kaku-ge rarerudearou
Iya ningen wa, jibun jishin ni taishi shōnindearu
Tatoe kare ga, iroiro benkai shite mo
Kono (kuruān o saisoku suru tame ni) anata no shita o isogashi ku ugokashite wa naranai
Sore o atsume, sore o yoma seru no wa, ware no shigotodearu
Sorede ware ga sore o yonda toki, sono dokuju ni shitagae
Sarani sore o tokiakasu no mo, hontōni ware no shigotodearu
Iya, anata gata wa (hate nai) ukiyo o aishite
raise o tōkan ni suru
Sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kagayaki
kare-ra no omo o, aogi miru
Mata sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kuraku
sebone o kudaku hodo no dai sainan ga, kare-ra ni furikakaru koto o shirudearou
Iya,(tamashī ga) nodomoto ni todoku toki
iwa reyou. `Dareka, noroi ga dekiru ka
Kare wa ribetsu (no toki)dearu koto o satorudearou
Hitotsu no ashi wa tahō no ashi ni karamari
sonohi kare wa, omo ni karitate rareru
Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bō-ge nakatta
kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari
omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita
Anata (tashinkyō to) ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na
Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na
Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de hōnin sa reru to omou no ka
Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka
Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arrā ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri
kare wa, ningen o otome no ryōsei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka
Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka
Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka
Hontōni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongō shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chōkaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa
Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashī) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to
Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita
(Shinja no) zenkōsha wa, kāfūru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou
(Soreha) arrā no shimo be-tachi ga nomu izumi no koto de, ware wa omoinomamani konkonto (izumi o) waki dasa seru
Kare-ra (zenkōsha) wa chikai o hatashi, saiyaku no hirogaru hi o osorete iru
Mata kare-ra wa, kare o keiai suru tame ni, hinja to minashigo to horyo ni shokumotsu o ataeru
(Soshite iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa, arrā no o yorokobi o negatte, anata gata o yashinai, anata gata ni hōshū mo kansha mo motomemasen
Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no kujū ni michita o ikarinohi o osoremasu
Sorede arrā wa, sonohi no saiyaku kara kare-ra o mamori, subarashī yorokobi o atae rareru
Kare-ra ga taeshinondanode, kare wa rakuen to kinu (no i) de kare-ra ni mukuwa re
sono (rakuen no)-chū de, nedoko no ue ni yuttari to mi o nobashi, kare-ra wa kokusho no taiyō mo, kōru samuke mo oboenaidearou
(Jumoku no) kokage wa kare-ra no ue o ōi,(kajitsu no) bō wa tsutsumashiku tare kudaru
Gin no mizusashi to garasuno-hai wa, kare-ra no ma ni mawasa reyou
Garasu (no hai to mieta no) wa gin de tsukura rete ite, kare-ra wa konomi no ryō o sore ni mitasu
Kare-ra wa soko de, shōga o mazeta hai no nomimono o atae rareyou
Soko ni, sarusabīru to nadzuke rareru izumi ga aru
